pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detrended Fluctuation Analysis // Containing the Detrended Fluctuation Analysis (DFA), Detrended Cross-Correlation Analysis (DCCA), Detrended Cross-Correlation Coefficient (rhoDCCA), Delta Amplitude Detrended Cross-Correlation Coefficient (DeltarhoDCCA), log amplitude Detrended Fluctuation Analysis (DeltalogDFA), and the Activity Balance Index, it also includes two DFA automatic methods for identifying crossover points and a Deltalog automatic method for identifying reference channels.
